typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Indicator as string,
		Value as string,
		DHS_CountryCode as string,
		IndicatorId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Anemia
source(output(
		CODE_ISO_2 as string,
		NAME_SHORT_EN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Ref
Anemia, Ref join(DHS_CountryCode == CODE_ISO_2,
	joinType:'left',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinedData
JoinedData derive(Con_Short_Name = iifNull(NAME_SHORT_EN, 'UNKNOWN'),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		Indicator,
		Value,
		DHS_CountryCode,
		IndicatorId,
		Con_Short_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> BronzeSink
